title: Automated Zen Garden
description: A coffee table designed to house an automated zen garden. This was done using a RAMPS board to control a core XY CNC mechanism underneath the table which moved a magnet on top of the table, carving patterns in some sand.

title: Headstrong Messenger
description: I was part of a research team that created an interactive Ionic chatbot app to help struggling teens with depression and anxiety. I headed the front-end development for this project using Ionic and Angular.

title: Robot Arm
description: A robotic arm that I built with Hayden Moore. This robotic arm performs various functions and is wirelessly controlled using an ESP-32.

title: Vending Machine
description: A Vending Machine that Zac Miller-Waugh and I fixed. It was donated entirely broke, so we replaced the electronics with our own system and added WIFI connectivity. Now, students can sell their creations for free!

title: Human
description: We used a vacuum-formed face. Ultra-realistic eyes 3D printed eyes, A duct tape body stuffed with clothes and a wig to create a human. We then added a servo mechanism and some computer vision to make the eyes follow you around the room.

title: Reindeer
description: I design a reindeer!!! Made in Blender, but it's been great to be able to do organic modelling!!! I then did a resin and powder bed print of it.

title: Decimal Clock
description: A clock that shows both standard 24hr time alongside a time system that is based on the original metric time system. This is to show that different time units exist and that that 24hrs in a day is not a brilliant idea.

title: Lantern
description: Final prototype from the smart lanterns (voice-enabled wifi-connected RGB lanterns) workshop I ran with Google Developer Student Club and the Maker Club.

title: Collaborative Puzzle
description: In moving from New Zealand I designed a puzzle of the country. Each piece was painted by someone close to me then I assembled it. It is a reminder of the people I care about and the places I have been.

title: Heat Exchanger
description: A heat exchanger designed to be optimal for powder bed fusion 3D printing without support and exchanging heat efficiently using a gyroid pattern

title: Name Plate
description: A small name plate for my desk designed to represent various aspects of the organisation I work at. Made with CNC routed native puriri wood, laser cut acyrilc, and 320LED/m lights.

title: Manifold
description: A metal 3d printed part I designed to move water to various pipes. It was printed at CDAM lab using aluminium powder bed fusion.

title: Arrow Wall Décor
description: Two arrows that I shot through each other during an archery session I thought they looked cool so I added them to my wall décor.

title: Book
description: A note book which I bound in leather.

title: Clay
description: River Clay which I refined for future projects.

title: Futuristic Hexagons
description: Futuristic laser-cut hexagons finished with oil backlight with white LEDs made to fill in a small nook in my room have created a more interesting video call background.

title: DUCKS
description: A small duck army I am building... for reasons.

title: Chess Photography
description: Long-exposure photography of a chess game.

title: Bus App
description: An app designed to make bus rides less boring with a set of collaborative tools.

title: Count Me In
description: A scheduling App to make arranging meeting times much simpler than it currently is.

title: Life Evaluation
description: A tool I created to help evaluate my life using various metrics so I can improve it.

title: HCI research
description: Human-Computer Interaction research site for understanding how people understand emotion in written text.

title: IB Key chain
description: An IB key chain laser cut that moves freely.

title: Long Exposure 'light painting'
description: A long exposure light painting.

title: Peristaltic Pump
description: A Peristaltic Pump designed to be laser cut.

title: Robot
description: A VEX robot for the VEX Robotics Competition.

title: Zona
description: Zona is a computer vision system that detects and counts the number of people in an area. Designed to help meet regulations during COVID, analyse which areas are being used most often.

title: Worlds Smallest Keyboard
description: We designed the world's smallest mechanical keyboard and produced some PCBs of the design the design uses an ATmega32U4 as its controller.

title: Birth Rate Visualiser
description: A visualiser to explain various factors which affect birth rates.

title: Training App
description: An application to improve the productivity of staff so they would not have to manually enter the details of participants in training.

title: Email Tracker
description: An email tracking service to be notified when someone has opened an email sent and a dashboard to company it.

title: Te Kaha
description: A dashboard to help staff members of Te Kaha organise and manage Rangatahi data.

title: Wearable Art
description: A shirt made out of bread, among other projects.

title: Laser cut bread
description: A range of puns around bread and toast such as Elon Crust and Toast Malon.

title: Earth Sandwhich
description: We made an earth sandwich - placed slices of bread at exact opposite points on the globe.

title: Chess Board
description: I made a custom chess board from kwila wood and acrylic inlay.

title: Fabric Arts
description: Tie Dye and a range of fabric arts.

title: String Heart
description: A heart made out of string.

title: Miniatures Painting
description: Painting DnD minis

title: Collaborative Art
description: A pizza painted by a group of 10 people.

title: Br**nFuck
description: Interpreter for the programming language BrainFuck made to show how low-level languages operate.

title: Glowbox
description: I created a  glowing box to display different patterns as decor.

title: Rubik's Cube Solver
description: Rubik's Cube Solving website... cause it's too hard to solve a cube the normal way.

title: Long Exposure Photography
description: Spinning Steel wool long exposure photography.

title: Physical Lissajous Table
description: Coming soon...

title: Non-planar Ironing
description: Coming soon...
